thread.title: Men’s Hoops To Hold Annual Red-White Game

title: Men’s Hoops To Hold Annual Red-White Game
text:

Post to Facebook Men’s Hoops To Hold Annual Red-White Game FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. – Fans can get their first game action look at the 2015-16 edition of the Arkansas men’s basketball team on Sunday, Nov. 1 when the team hosts its annual Red-White scrimmage at Bud Walton Arena.  //on.kthv.com/1LPxTfM   Join the Conversation To   Men’s Hoops To Hold Annual Red-White Game Razorbacks Communications, News Release 3:09 p.m. CDT October 22, 2015 Fans can get their first game action look at the 2015-16 edition of the Arkansas men’s basketball team on Sunday, Nov. 1 when the team hosts its annual Red-White scrimmage at Bud Walton Arena. (Photo: Razorbacks Communications) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. – Fans can get their first game action look at the 2015-16 edition of the Arkansas men’s basketball team on Sunday, Nov. 1 when the team hosts its annual Red-White scrimmage at Bud Walton Arena. 
Free and open to the public, the scrimmage will begin at 5 p.m. with doors to Bud Walton Arena opening at 4 p.m. Head coach Mike Anderson and the Razorbacks are asking fans to bring a non-perishable food item to donate with collection points at each entrance at BWA. All the items donated will benefit the Full Circle Food Pantry on campus. 
Rosters for the Red-White scrimmage will be released next week. 
Once doors open at 4 p.m., fans can make their way to the southeast and southwest concourse to meet the Razorbacks who will be signing autographs from 4-4:30 p.m. Fans are encouraged to park in lots 46, 56, 56B, 56D and 60. Located in Bud Walton Arena, Hog Heaven will stay open for the duration of the scrimmage. 
While watching the #Fastest40 on the court, fans interested in purchasing season tickets, partial plans or suites will be able to select seats the in the lower or upper levels based on availability. Ticket sales representatives will be on hand to answer questions and process orders. Season tickets are available for as low as $360 for the upcoming 19-game slate at Bud Walton Arena. Season tickets, an SEC mini plan and single-game tickets are available now at the Razorback Ticket Center, by phone at 1-800-982-HOGS (4647) and online by clicking here . 
For more information on Arkansas men’s basketball, follow @RazorbackMBB on Twitter. Read or Share this story: http://on.kthv.com/1LPxTfM TOP VIDEOS
